headline.main: Deutsche Bank Tests Investor Patience With $8.5 Billion Cash Call
headline.print_headline: Deutsche Bank Tests Investor Patience With $8.5 Billion Cash Call

lead_paragraph: Deutsche Bank's chief executive pledged on Monday to see through a strategic turnaround as he sought to persuade weary shareholders to sign an 8 billion euro (6.92 billion pounds) cheque to back his plans.
snippet: Deutsche Bank's chief executive pledged on Monday to see through a strategic turnaround as he sought to persuade weary shareholders to sign an 8 billion euro (6.92 billion pounds) cheque to back his plans....
